oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Frank Blevins and Corwin Matthews home disc recordings
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recordings of Devil's Dream, Wonderful Love, and Ida Red, as performed by Frank Blevins, Billy Sapp, Junior Sapp, Corwin Matthews, and Odell Tolliver recording in the late 40's and early 50's, according to content sheet inside of tape case.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Frank Blevins; Billy Sapp; Junior Sapp; Corwin Matthews; Odell Tolliver
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Devil's Dream (Frank Blevins) -- Wonderful Love (Corwin Matthews) [unconfirmed] -- Wonderful Love (Corwin Matthews) [unconfirmed] -- Ida Red (Frank Blevins) -- [Unidentified recording of a baseball game announcer] -- [Unidentified soundcheck]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blevins, Frank, 1911-
